Description: Unique and standardized identifier for each Pacific salmon Conservation Unit (CU)
Data type, either Absolute Abundance (AbsAbd) or Relative Index (RelIdx)
Wild spawner abundance that can be used to calculate abundance-based WSP metrics (relative abundance and absolute abundance)
Wild spawner abundance that can be used to calculate trend-based WSP metrics (long-term trend and percent change)
Ratio of the recent average spawner abundance to the relative abundance metric lower benchmark (where available)
Ratio of the recent average spawner abundance to the absolute abundance metric lower benchmark
Ratio of the recent average spawner abundance to the relative abundance metric upper benchmark (where available)
Ratio of the recent average spawner abundance to the absolute abundance metric upper benchmark
End node of the WSP rapid status decision tree that determined the rapid status
WSP decision tree pathway that led to the end node (BinLabel) and rapid status
Total spawner abundance that can be used to calculate abundance-based WSP metrics (relative abundance and absolute abundance)
Total spawner abundance that can be used to calculate trend-based WSP metrics (long-term trend and percent change)
